290894.「５００年前と 現代の破邪舟師\n そして エテーネの民……\n みなさまを 心:
The Ship Shapers from both past and present,
and the one from Ethene... I welcome you
here with my deepest gratitude.

290895.「大地の箱舟は なにゆえ 安全に\n アストルティアの地を 運行できるか\n 考:
Have you ever wondered what makes the Ark of
the Earth able to travel throughout the lands
of Astoltia so safely?

290896.「……そう。かつて 天の箱舟と呼ばれし\n この舟に 秘められた\n 破邪のチカ:
Yes... it was once called the Starflight
Express, and the sacred power within it keeps
evil at bay.

290897.「つまり 大地の箱舟は\n あなたがたが あやつる破邪舟と ある意味では\n 近:
In other words, the Ark of the Earth may be,
in some sense, a close relative to the Sacred
Ships that you sail.

290898.「もしかして……\n 破邪舟を 強化する方法って！:
So, that means... a way to strengthen the
Sacred Ship!

290899.「お察しのとおり。\n 破邪の紋章にて 大地の箱舟自体を\n 破邪舟とする術のこ:
As you may have already guessed, that Sacred
Crest can transform the Ark of the Earth into
a Sacred Ship of its own.

290900.「私の破邪舟では 歯が立たなかった\n レイダメテスも……\n この 大地の箱舟:
My Sacred Ship was no match for dat
Reidametes... but dis Ark of the Earth is a
different story!

290901.「<cs_pchero>様。\n あなたは かつて ５００年前へ向かい\n 過去:
<cs_pchero>. You once traveled
500 years into the past and saved the world
of that era.

290902.「時は 線路と同様 円環を 描くもの……。:
Like a railroad track, time loops again and
again...

290903.「それゆえ 時の円環は この時代を救うため\n ５００年前より\n エルジュ様を:
Therefore, the wheel of time has called upon
Erju from 500 years ago to save the world
in the present era.

290904.「時の円環が 崩れれば 運命は 巡り巡りて\n 救ったはずの ５００年前の世界も:
If the wheel of time is broken, fate will once again repeat and the world from 500 years ago will fail to be saved...
That's why I am here to guide you.

290906.「この時代に 冥王ネルゲルが復活するから\n 大地の箱舟に乗れ……というのが\n:
My master foretold a prophecy that Nergel
would reappear in this time... and that I
should board the Ark of the Earth.

290907.「あの時は 何を 言ってるんだ？\n と思ったけれど こうして ボクは\n ゼー:
At the time, I had no idea what he meant...
But then I met Zebes, and was able to come
here into the future.

290909.「大地の箱舟を 破邪舟に 変えるには\n 破邪舟師のチカラと 時渡りのチカラ\n:
For the Ark of the Earth to become the Sacred
Ship, we need the combined power of a Ship
Shaper, a time traveler, and the Sacred Crest.

290910.「すでに 大地の箱舟には\n 破邪の紋章を 装着しております。:
The Ark of the Earth has already been fitted
with the crest.

290911.「ふたりの 破邪舟師よ！\n そして エテーネの民よ！\n ……今こそ 大地の箱:
To both of the Ship Shapers and the one of
Ethene! Now is the time to lend your power to
the Ark of the Earth!

290912.「これまでとは ケタ違いの チカラが\n 私の身体に みなぎっています！:
I've never felt a kinda power like this
before! My body's tinglin'!

290913.「エルジュ様が 死の宿命より\n 解き放たれたことが 子孫である あなた様に\n:
I hope that Erju's escape from a certain death
has had a positive influence on you, his
descendant...

290914.「わたくし 時の車掌ゼーベスは\n 今 ここに 特別列車 大地の破邪舟の\n 運:
I, Zebes, the Conductor of Time, hereby
approve service of the Sacred Ship of the
Earth!

290917.「大地の破邪舟……出発 進行ーっ！:
Sacred Ark of the Earth... proceed with
departure!

290918.「この ケイトさまに黙って\n 冥王ネルゲル討伐に 向かうたぁ\n 水くせぇぜ…:
So you're gonna go ahead and defeat that
Nergel guy without takin' ME? I'm heartbroken,
<cs_pchero>...

290920.「へへへッ。\n あと ちょっと…で……？: Heh heh... just a little bit...

290922.「ようやく ここまで たどり着いたか。\n 待ちかねたぞ <cs_pchero>:
So, you've finally made it this far...
I've been waiting for you, <cs_pchero>.

290923.「この冥王の前に 己が魂を捧げるため\n 自ら 現れるとは よい心がけよな。:
How kind of you to show yourself before the
Netherlord and offer your soul.

290924.「……ネるゲル……さ…マ……\n 我ラ……貴方様の……おチカらに……:
Lord... Nergel... we lend... you...
...our power....

290925.「冥府ノ…縛鎖…ハ……\n 我ラの怨念で 編まれタもノ……！\n 生者にハ 決し:
The shackles of the... underworld are woven...
...with our hatred... the living can... never
hope... to break them...!!

290926.「さァ ネるゲル様！\n ソやつヲ倒しィ……こたビこォそ…ッ！\n アすトルテぃ:
Lord Nergel! You must... defeat them all...
...and destroy Astoltia!

290929.「誰に 指図しておる。\n ……消えろ。:
Who are you to order me around?
Begone.

290931.「ひさかたぶりの 戦いに 水をさす\n 無粋な配下どもを 罰したまでだ。:
I merely punished those who would interfere
in our long coming battle.

290932.「……復活の祭壇で 感じたとおり\n あの頃より はるかに強くなったようだな。\:
Just as I felt when I was resurrected again,
you have become much stronger. You have
a different look about you...

290933.「だが……\n 我は あまねく 死を統べる者。:
However... I am the one who commands dominion
over death.

290934.「貴様が 敵を倒せば 倒すほど\n ……多くの死を振りまけば 振りまくほど！\n:
The more of your enemies that you defeat, the
more death you wreak! My power will continue
to grow indefinitely!

290935.「さりとて……\n あとひとつ 足りないものがある。: However... there is just one thing missing.

290936.「この アストルティアで\n もっとも 強き者である 貴様の魂を\n 喰らったと:
Only when I have consumed the soul of the most
powerful being in Astoltia will I truly be
whole!

290937.「さあ！ 決着をつけようぞ！\n 我は 貴様の死を 復活の のろしとし\n こた:
Come! Let us end this here and now! I shall
use your death as the final step of my
resurrection, and I will destroy Astoltia!

290938.「生きとし生ける者は すべて\n 死からは 逃れられぬのだ！！: No mortal being can escape death!!

290939.「こたびも 貴様の 勝ちのようだな。\n ……<cs_pchero>よ。:
It seems you've bested me once again,
<cs_pchero>...

290940.「だが 我は あまねく死を統べる者。: Yet... I command dominion over death.

290941.「貴様が 戦い続けるかぎり\n 我は 貴様が倒した者の 魂を 喰ろうて\n 何度:
Know that as long as you continue to fight, I
will feed on the souls of your fallen foes
and I shall rise again and again...

290943.「……いずれまた 相まみえようぞ。: We shall meet each other again...

290944.「やったな <cs_pchero>！\n ボクたちの勝利だ！: We did it! We beat him!

290945.「うわあっ！？\n マズい……急いで 脱出しよう！:
Huh?! This looks bad... we need to get out of
here, now!

290946.「みなさま お見事でございました。\n ささ 急いで 地上へ 戻りましょう。:
You've done well, everyone. Now then, let us
return to the land below.

290947.「大地の破邪舟……出発 進行ーっ！:
Sacred Ark of the Earth... proceed with
departure!

290948.「冥王ネルゲルも レイダメテスも\n 消え去った……。\n もう 心配ないだろう:
Both Nergel and Reidametes have vanished...
Looks like we can finally rest easy.

290949.「……これも この時代で 出会った\n 様々な人々の おかげだな。:
I owe everything to the many people I met in
this era...

290950.「そして 誰より 君のね……。\n <cs_pchero> 本当に ありがとう。:
But I think I owe you more than anyone else...
Thank you so much, <cs_pchero>.

290951.「昔……君と 約束しただろ。: I made you a promise a long time ago...

290952.「たとえ 生きる時代が 違っていても\n 君とボクは ずっと 友達だ……って。:
That even though we live in different eras,
you and I will always be friends...

290953.「ボクの友達が生きる\n この時代の アストルティアを\n 救うことができて 本:
I'm really glad I was able to save the
Astoltia of this era, the one you live in...

290954.「賢者のみんなや 破邪舟師たちにも\n できれば 別れのあいさつが したかったけ:
I wish I could've said goodbye to all of the
sages and the Ship Shapers, but... it looks
like I'm almost out of time.

290955.「ボクは 自分の時代に戻る。\n 残念だけど 今のボクが\n 君と話せるのは こ:
I'll be returning to my own time. It's
unfortunate, but... this will be the last
time we'll ever speak to each other.

290956.「世界の危機は もう こりごりだけど\n もうすこしだけ <cs_pchero>:
With this crisis ended, I'd like to travel
with you just a little bit longer,
<cs_pchero>...

290957.「よッ！ オメェも 乗ってたとはなァ。\n <cs_pchero>！:
Yo! Didn't know you were ridin' the train,
too.

290958.「なぁなぁ 聞いたかよっ！？\n 突然 レイダメテスが 消えちまったって！\n:
Hey, hey, didja hear?! Reidametes just poofed
outta nowhere! I'm sure that X was behind it!

290959.「しっかし お前も 冥王討伐を狙ってたのに\n 残念だったなァ。まっ エックスさ:
But, you were tryin' to beat the Netherlord
too, weren'tcha? Hey, no one comes close to
how good X is!

290960.「やっぱ あのお方は すげーや！\n さっすが 伝説の冒険者だぜぃっ。:
They're amazin'! A legendary adventurer for
sure!

290961.「……そういや オメェのツレの\n あの ヒョロいのは どこいったんだ？\n ず:
What happened to short stuff that was with
you? You guys seemed pretty stuck together.

290962.「……ふーん。故郷に 帰っちまったのか。\n まぁ そう ショボくれんなよ。\n:
Mmmm... so he went back home. Well, don't
worry 'bout it. I'm sure you'll see him again
eventually from travelin' around.

290963.「さて……と。次は どこへ行くかねえ。\n アストルティアにゃぁ\n まだまだ:
Now then... where to go next? So many places
in Astoltia I haven't explored yet...

290964.「野越え 山越え 海越えて……いや。\n アタシらなら 天だって超えられるさ。\:
Through fields, over mountains, across seas...
...no. I'll even surpass the heavens!
Right, <cs_pchero>?!

290965.「次は～ グレン城～ グレン城～。: We will soon be arriving at Glen Castle.

290966.「おっと。ずいぶん 長話しちまったぜ。\n じゃあな <cs_pchero>！\:
Oops. Looks like I was talkin' too much.
Welp, <cs_pchero>! Next time
we meet, I'll beat ya for sure!

290967.「……みなさま このたびは\n 当 大地の箱舟に ご乗車いただき\n まことに:
To everyone on board, thank you very much for
choosing to ride the Ark of the Earth.

290968.「みなさまの これからの旅が\n すばらしきものと なりますよう\n 我々一同:
We sincerely wish you all the best in all of
your future travels.

290969.<center>待っていたぞ <pc>……。\n忌々しき エテーネの生き残りよ。:
I've been waiting for you, <pc>....
Wretched survivor of Ethene...

290970.<center>我が居城 蘇りし神殿レイダメテスへ\nよくぞ 参った。:
Welcome to my restored domain of Reidametes.
You've done well to come here.

290971.<center>貴様を倒し あの雪辱を 果たさぬかぎりは\n我が 復活は 完全と:
My resurrection will not be complete until my
redemption of finally defeating you...

290972.<center>貴様が いかほど チカラをつけたか\nこの死が支配する世界におい:
I will show you just how powerful I have
become in my domain of death.

290973.<center>さあ 早く 我が玉座まで 来るがよい。\n……我は 貴様の訪れを:
Now, make haste to my throne. I eagerly await
your arrival...
